body_html: @asimshankar Hey, thanks! This was spot on, now it works very fast :) The issue bugged me for several days before I posted it here. I understand that my case can be quite rare, but perhaps to save other people trouble down the road it would be nice to make this feature somehow more explicit. Also, is it possible to manually choose those algorithms it tries to profile automatically?
